title: Africa, COVID-19 and Imperialism with Jeremy Loffredo
cleaned_text:
Jeremy Loffredo joins Whitney to discuss the vaccine inequity argument common among the left as it relates to Africa and how Covid-19 is being used as cover for Western militarism and imperialism on the continent.

Scientists Mystified, Wary, as Africa avoids Covid Disaster

Africa, Far Behind on Vaccines

Omicron raises concerns about global vaccine equity and hesitancy

New omicron variant brings COVID-19 vaccine inequity ‘home to roost’

WHO: Vaccine hesitancy persists among Africa health workers

Identity in a Digital World: A new chapter in the social contract

‘Cloak and dagger’ military-intelligence outfit at center of US digital vaccine passport push

Public health or private wealth? How digital vaccine passports pave way for unprecedented surveillance capitalism

Tanzania’s Late President Magufuli: “Science Denier” or Threat to Empire?
